About

Hello world!

Feb 2, 2015

Hey! I’m @lachlanjc, a human that likes to design and hack apps. I’m into Rails, SCSS, efficiency, and typography. Noodles is my latest project, a simple cooking app.

With time, this blog will fill with thoughts (mainly on design), code (snippets, tutorials, and tales of crap I dared to ventured into), ideas (you know, if I have any), and perhaps a few interviews. My next post will probably detail what went into building this blog.

Enjoy!

This site was built by @lachlanjc with Jekyll, Typekit, Basscss, and GitHub Pages.

Oh, and there's an RSS feed.
